## COUNTRIES variable

Maps ISO 3166 Alpha 2 codes to UN M49 numbers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
COUNTRIES: Record<Country, CountryNum>
```

## Remarks

\[UN M49 to ISO 3166 information\](https://unstats.un.org/unsd/methodology/m49/)
